,"loan",{name:"isOut",convert:function(b,a){return !Ext.isEmpty(a.data.loan.out)}},{name:"outTime",convert:function(c,b){console.log("outTime");var a=null;if(b.data.loan.out){a=moment(b.data.loan.out).toDate()}return a}},{name:"outPurpose",convert:function(b,a){return a.data.loan.purpose||""}},{name:"outAgo",convert:function(f,b){var c=b.get("outTime");if(c){var h=HooferSailingMobile.util.Util.pluralize;var g=Ext.Date.getElapsed(HooferSailingMobile.now,c);var e=Math.round(g/1000,0);var a=Math.round(e/60,0);var d=Math.floor(a/60,0);a=(a%60);var i=(d?h(d,"hour")+" ":"")+h(a,"minute");return i}}}
